title: DocuSign E-Signature
content:
Simpli.fi uses DocuSign to manage important employee and client documents in need of signature. Effective September 1, 2024, it is the e-signature application of choice for all Simpli.fi employee use cases. What follows are supplemental, internal instructions for:

Child Pages:
- Logging into DocuSign (ID: 4512612371) - Instructions Log into your Okta Portal if you have not yet done so for the day
- DocuSign Google Integration (ID: 4517953614)
- DocuSign: Basic Features (ID: 4513234965)
- DocuSign: Advanced Features (ID: 4513529861)
- Transition from Adobe Acrobat Sign (ID: 4512874554) - Context for the Decision Historically, Simpli
  - FAQ's: The Move to DocuSign (ID: 4512809054)
  - Future DocuSign Functionality (ID: 4512579596)
